text: @AndrewCMcCarthy So sad. But I'm glad is another Monday and my kid is in remote learning with Success Academy Charter School because the @MTA in @NYGovCuomo and @NYCMayor land is not cleaning the trains till Wednesday. They're spreading covid-19 all this time. #BlueNewYork
